name: Notion Starter Pack
description: Get started with Notion like a proThe first approach with Notion can be confused. A blank page with hundreds of blocks to insert can leave you disoriented. That's why many people give up on discovering more about this fantastic tool, which can potentially manage every aspect of your life.What is the Notion Starter Pack?Notion Starter Pack is a template bundle built to help you understand how Notion works. You will learn the basics and it will help you to be more productive and organized. Learn h
features: Daily planner; Weekly planner; Monthly planner; Bookmarks Manager; Movie Tracker; Book Tracker; Expense Tracker; Task Manager; Habit Tracker; Resume / CV
